name: Gear Fighter Dendoh
overview: Bandai and Sunrise proudly presents a new game taken from an anime series: Gear Senshi Dendoh for the PlayStation and the PlayStation One. STORY: An alien threat from another universe bent on destruction has now setup its base on the moon, who is the mysterious yellow-haired masked lady, is she friend or foe?, a secret robot created by a secret organization to counter the threat of an invasion and what about the two school kids named Hokuto and Ginga? follow the kids' adventure to save the Earth and mankind from total annihilation using a weapon that has never been seen before. Gameplay: The gmae is basically a beat'em up since the player have to defeat all the enemies of each stage to reach the final level boss but some of those bosses have also a second fight that got a vs fighting gameplay. Game modes: - Story mode - 2 Player VS mode
